divs: Sighting DetailsWITNESS WAS TRAVELING ON ROUTE 40 EAST TOWARDS POLE TAVERN AND ROUTE 77 AFTER DRIVING THROUGH WOODSTOWN NJ. SHE NOTICED A STRANGE BLACK TRIANGLE IN THE SKY AND SHE PULLED TO THE SIDE OF THE ROAD TO SEE IT BETTER. IT HOVERED OVER THE TREE LINE WHICH WAS A SHORT DISTANCE FROM HER CAR. SHE NOTICED THE OBJECT FROM THE DRIVERS SIDE OF THE CAR WITH THE WINDOW DOWN. THERE WAS NO NOISE OR MOVEMENT. IT JUST HOVERED THERE...ON THE UNDERSIDE OF THE TRIANGLE IT WAS LIT UP WITH LIGHTS THAT WERE BRIGHT BUT NOT BLINDING. ...SEE DRAWING....SHE COULD NOT TELL IF THE MIDDLE OF THE TRIANGLE WAS FILLED IN OR NOT...SKY WAS CLEAR AND IT WAS APROX 9 PM AT NIGHT...SHE WAS COMING HOME FROM HER HAIR DRESSER IN PENNSVILLE NJ.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Woodstown
There were no other sightings in Woodstown on or around June 4th 2009
Summary: Witness sighted a black triangle with light on the bottom side of the object, hovered, no noise...size of a baseball at arms length.
